62 }

64 RenderShapes::~RenderShapes()

66  clear();

69 void RenderShapes::clear()
70 {
71  scene_shapes_.clear();
72  octree_voxel_grids_.clear();
73 }
74 
75 void RenderShapes::renderShape(Ogre::SceneNode* node, const shapes::Shape* s, const Eigen::Isometry3d& p,
76  OctreeVoxelRenderMode octree_voxel_rendering, OctreeVoxelColorMode octree_color_mode,
77  const rviz::Color& color, float alpha)
78 {
79  rviz::Shape* ogre_shape = nullptr;
80  Eigen::Vector3d translation = p.translation();
81  Ogre::Vector3 position(translation.x(), translation.y(), translation.z());
82  ASSERT_ISOMETRY(p) // unsanitized input, could contain a non-isometry
83  Eigen::Quaterniond q(p.linear());
84  Ogre::Quaternion orientation(q.w(), q.x(), q.y(), q.z());
85 
86  // we don't know how to render cones directly, but we can convert them to a mesh
87  if (s->type == shapes::CONE)
88  {
89  std::unique_ptr<shapes::Mesh> m(shapes::createMeshFromShape(static_cast<const shapes::Cone&>(*s)));
90  if (m)
91  renderShape(node, m.get(), p, octree_voxel_rendering, octree_color_mode, color, alpha);
92  return;
93  }
94 
95  switch (s->type)
96  {
97  case shapes::SPHERE:
98  {
99  ogre_shape = new rviz::Shape(rviz::Shape::Sphere, context_->getSceneManager(), node);
100  double d = 2.0 * static_cast<const shapes::Sphere*>(s)->radius;
101  ogre_shape->setScale(Ogre::Vector3(d, d, d));
102  }
103  break;
104  case shapes::BOX:
105  {
106  ogre_shape = new rviz::Shape(rviz::Shape::Cube, context_->getSceneManager(), node);
107  const double* sz = static_cast<const shapes::Box*>(s)->size;
108  ogre_shape->setScale(Ogre::Vector3(sz[0], sz[1], sz[2]));
109  }
110  break;
111  case shapes::CYLINDER:
112  {
113  ogre_shape = new rviz::Shape(rviz::Shape::Cylinder, context_->getSceneManager(), node);
114  double d = 2.0 * static_cast<const shapes::Cylinder*>(s)->radius;
115  double z = static_cast<const shapes::Cylinder*>(s)->length;
116  ogre_shape->setScale(Ogre::Vector3(d, z, d)); // the shape has z as major axis, but the rendered cylinder has y
117  // as major axis (assuming z is upright);
118  }
119  break;
120  case shapes::MESH:
121  {
122  const shapes::Mesh* mesh = static_cast<const shapes::Mesh*>(s);
123  if (mesh->triangle_count > 0)
124  {
125  rviz::MeshShape* m = new rviz::MeshShape(context_->getSceneManager(), node);
126  ogre_shape = m;
127 
128  Ogre::Vector3 normal(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
129  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mesh->triangle_count; ++i)
130  {
131  unsigned int i3 = i * 3;
132  if (mesh->triangle_normals && !mesh->vertex_normals)
133  {
134  normal.x = mesh->triangle_normals[i3];
135  normal.y = mesh->triangle_normals[i3 + 1];
136  normal.z = mesh->triangle_normals[i3 + 2];
137  }
138 
139  for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k)
140  {
141  unsigned int vi = 3 * mesh->triangles[i3 + k];
142  Ogre::Vector3 v(mesh->vertices[vi], mesh->vertices[vi + 1], mesh->vertices[vi + 2]);
143  if (mesh->vertex_normals)
144  {
145  Ogre::Vector3 n(mesh->vertex_normals[vi], mesh->vertex_normals[vi + 1], mesh->vertex_normals[vi + 2]);
146  m->addVertex(v, n);
147  }
148  else if (mesh->triangle_normals)
149  m->addVertex(v, normal);
150  else
151  m->addVertex(v);
152  }
153  }
154  m->endTriangles();
155  }
156  }
157  break;
158 
159  case shapes::OCTREE:
160  {
161  OcTreeRenderPtr octree(new OcTreeRender(static_cast<const shapes::OcTree*>(s)->octree, octree_voxel_rendering,
162  octree_color_mode, 0u, node));
163  octree->setPosition(position);
164  octree->setOrientation(orientation);
165  octree_voxel_grids_.push_back(octree);
166  }
167  break;
168 
169  default:
170  break;
171  }
172 
173  if (ogre_shape)
174  {
175  ogre_shape->setColor(color.r_, color.g_, color.b_, alpha);
176 
177  if (s->type == shapes::CYLINDER)
178  {
179  // in geometric shapes, the z axis of the cylinder is its height;
180  // for the rviz shape, the y axis is the height; we add a transform to fix this
181  static Ogre::Quaternion fix(Ogre::Radian(boost::math::constants::pi<double>() / 2.0),
182  Ogre::Vector3(1.0, 0.0, 0.0));
183  orientation = orientation * fix;
184  }
185 
186  ogre_shape->setPosition(position);
187  ogre_shape->setOrientation(orientation);
188  scene_shapes_.emplace_back(ogre_shape);
189  }
190 }
191 
192 void RenderShapes::updateShapeColors(float r, float g, float b, float a)
193 {
194  for (const std::unique_ptr<rviz::Shape>& shape : scene_shapes_)
195  shape->setColor(r, g, b, a);
196 }
197 
198 } // namespace moveit_rviz_plugin
